abilities.name: Tactical Perception
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Fights First ability.

abilities.name: Tenacious Spirit
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll if that unit is below its Starting Strength, and add 1 to the Wound roll as well if that unit is Below Half-strength.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description:
This model can be attached to the following units:
■ Prosecutors
■ Vigilators
■ Witchseekers

abilities.name: Slayers of Tyrants
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets a ^^Character, Monster^^ or ^^Vehicle^^ unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

abilities.name: From Golden Light
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the end of your opponent's turn, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you can remove it from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

abilities.name: Self Repair
abilities.description: At the start of your Command phase, this model regains 1 lost wound.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description:
This model can be attached to the following units:
■ Custodian Guard
■ Custodian Wardens

abilities.name: Martial Inspiration
abilities.description: Once per battle, in your Charge phase, this model's unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

abilities.name: Swift Onslaught
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for that unit.

abilities.name: Stand Vigil
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. While this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

abilities.name: Sentinel Storm
abilities.description: Once per battle, in your Shooting phase, after the unit has shot, it can shoot again.

abilities.name: Resolute Will
abilities.description: While a CHARACTER is leading this unit, each time an attack targets this unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Living Fortress
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this unit can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Prosecutors, Vigilators, or Witchseekers.

abilities.name: Seeker's Instincts
abilities.description: Add 2" to Move and +2 to Advance/Charge rolls for the led unit.

abilities.name: Corner the Quarry
abilities.description: Enemy non-Monster/Vehicle units falling back must take Desperate Escape tests.

abilities.name: Daughters of the Abyss
abilities.description: Feel No Pain 3+ against Psychic Attacks and mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Purity of Execution
abilities.description: Ranged attacks targeting PSYKER units gain Precision and Devastating Wounds.

abilities.name: Master of the Stances
abilities.description: Once per battle, both Ka'tah Stances are active for this unit instead of only one.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Custodian Guard or Custodian Wardens.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description:
This model can be attached to the following units:
■ Allarus Custodians

abilities.name: Auramite and Adamantite
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to this model, change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 1.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Vertus Praetors.

abilities.name: Sweeping Advance
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the end of the Fight phase, this unit can Fall Back or make a Normal move.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description:
This model can be attached to the following units:
■ Custodian Guard
■ Custodian Wardens

abilities.name: Captain-General
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack's Ballistic Skill or Weapon Skill characteristics and/or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Moment Shackle
abilities.description:
Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, you can select one of the following to take effect until the end of the phase:
■ This model's Watcher's Axe melee weapon has an Attacks characteristic of 12.
■ This model has a 2+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description:
This model can be attached to the following units:
■ Custodian Guard
■ Custodian Wardens

abilities.name: Golden Laurels
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a melee attack targets that unit, worsen that Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

abilities.name: Hero of Lion's Gate
abilities.description: Once per battle, after making a Hit roll, Wound roll or saving throw for this model, you can change the result of that roll to an unmodified 6.

abilities.name: Unyielding Ancient
abilities.description: The first time this model is destroyed, remove it from play without resolving its Deadly Demise ability. Then, at the end of the phase, roll one D6: on a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with D6 wounds remaining.

abilities.name: Assault Ramp
abilities.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-5 Wounds remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Turbo Boost
abilities.description: Each time this unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit.

abilities.name: Quicksilver Execution
abilities.description: Once per battle, after this unit ends a normal or Advance move, you can select one enemy unit (excluding MONSTER and VEHICLE units) that it moved over during that move, then roll one D6 for each model in this unit; for each 2+, that enemy unit suffers 2 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Daughters of the Abyss
abilities.description: Feel No Pain 3+ against Psychic Attacks and mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Deft Parry
abilities.description: Melee attacks targeting this unit suffer -1 to Hit.

abilities.name: Scouts 6"
abilities.description: This unit can make a Normal move of up to 6" before the first turn begins.

abilities.name: Daughters of the Abyss
abilities.description: Feel No Pain 3+ against Psychic Attacks and mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Sanctified Flames
abilities.description: After shooting, one enemy unit hit must take a Battle-shock test.

units.name: Custodian Guard with Adrasite and Pyrithite spears

abilities.name: Stand Vigil
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. While this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

abilities.name: No Foe Shall Stand
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of your Shooting phase, this unit can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] and [IGNORES COVER abilities].

abilities.name: Disintegration Beams
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of your Shooting phase, this unit can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the Devastating Wounds ability.

abilities.name: Saturation Volleys
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, select one enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, while this unit is on the battlefield. that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the hit roll.

abilities.name: Heavy Assault Infantry
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible target, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

abilities.name: From Golden Light
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the end of your opponent's turn, if this unit is not whithin Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you can remove it from the battlefield. In the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase, set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

choices.name: Solerite power gauntlet + Lastrum storm bolter
Solerite power gauntlet + Twin adrathic destructor
Lastrum storm bolter + Solerite power talon
Twin adrathic destructor + Solerite power talon

abilities.name: Implacable Vanguard
abilities.description: Once per battle, in your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6". If it does, until the end of the turn, this unit is not elgibile to declare a charge.

abilities.name: Turbo Boost
abilities.description: Each time this unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit.

abilities.name: Strike from the Skies
abilities.description: This unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

abilities.name: Swooping Dive
abilities.description: Once per battle, you can target this unit with the Rapid Ingress Stratagem for 0 CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem that phase.

abilities.name: Galatus Shield
abilities.description: Each time a melee attack targets this model subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Dread Foe
abilities.description: Each time this model is selected to fight, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if this model made a Charge move this turn: on 4-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6+, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Merciless Hunter
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, each time this model makes an attack that targets an enemy unit that is Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Advanced Firepower
abilities.description: Each time this model makes an attack with its Twin iliastus accelerator cannon that targets an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES), that attack has the [LETHAL HITS] ability. Each time this model makes an attack with its Twin arachnus heavy blaze cannon that targets an enemy MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, that attack has the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-5 wounds remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Guardian Eternal
abilities.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-4 wounds remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Devoted to Destruction
abilities.description: If this model is equipped with 2 Telemon caestus weapons in addition to its armoured feet weapon, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of those Telemon caestus weapons.

abilities.name: Fire Support
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly model that disembarked from this ^^Transport^^ this turn makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-5 wounds remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-7 wounds remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Assault Dropship
abilities.description: If a unit disembarks from this TRANSPORT before it moves, until the end of the turn, that unit is eligibile to charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

abilities.name: Infernus Firebomb
abilities.description: Each time this model ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move. Until the end of the turn, models in that unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover. In addition, roll one D6 for eah model in that unit: for each 6, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-7 wounds remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

rules.name: Martial Mastery
rules.description: At the start of each battle round, select one option. Applies to units with Martial Ka'tah.

choices.name: Critical Hits 5+
choices.effect: Unmodified hit rolls of 5+ score critical hits in melee.

choices.name: Improved AP
choices.effect: Improve AP of melee weapons by 1.

stratagems.name: Arcane Genetic Alchemy
stratagems.description: After mortal wound allocation, unit gains Feel No Pain 4+ against mortal wounds until end of phase.

stratagems.name: Avenge the Fallen
stratagems.description: Below Starting Strength: +1 Attack. Below Half-strength: +2 Attacks instead.

stratagems.name: Unwavering Sentinels
stratagems.description: Infantry unit holding objective: attacks targeting it suffer -1 to Hit in melee.

stratagems.name: Multipotentiality
stratagems.description: Unit that fell back is eligible to shoot and charge this turn.

stratagems.name: Vigilance Eternal
stratagems.description: Battleline unit holds objective even if no models are within range of it.

stratagems.name: Archeotech Munitions
stratagems.description: Unit gains Lethal Hits or Sustained Hits 1 until end of phase.

enhancements.name: Auric Mantle
enhancements.description: Shield-Captain or Blade Champion only. Bearer gains +2 Wounds.

enhancements.name: Castellan's Mark
enhancements.description: Shield-Captain only. After deployment, redeploy up to two Adeptus Custodes units. May place in Strategic Reserves.

enhancements.name: From the Hall of Armouries
enhancements.description: Shield-Captain only. Add +1 Strength and +1 Damage to melee weapons.

enhancements.name: Panoptispex
enhancements.description: Shield-Captain or Blade Champion only. Bearer's unit ignores cover with ranged weapons.

rules.name: Revered Companions
rules.description: Anathema Psykana units have Null Aegis aura (6"): nearby Custodes gain Feel No Pain 5+ against psychic attacks and mortal wounds. Other Custodes units have Deadly Unity aura (6"): Anathema Psykana attacks gain +1 to Hit.

stratagems.name: Hunt as One
stratagems.description: Two units eligible to shoot/charge after falling back; one must be Anathema Psykana within 6".

stratagems.name: Talons Interlocked
stratagems.description: Two Infantry units focus fire on same target: gain +1 Strength and +1 AP.

stratagems.name: Empyric Severance
stratagems.description: Custodes unit gains Feel No Pain 4+ against psychic attacks if Anathema Psykana unit is nearby.

stratagems.name: Emperor's Executioners
stratagems.description: +1 to Wound rolls against enemies below Starting Strength.

stratagems.name: Taloned Pincer
stratagems.description: After enemy moves within 9", move up to 6".

stratagems.name: Shield of Honour
stratagems.description: Redirect attacks targeting Anathema Infantry to nearby Custodes Infantry.

enhancements.name: Aegis Projector
enhancements.description: Once per turn, change first failed saving throw to 0 damage.

enhancements.name: Champion of the Imperium
enhancements.description: Extends Null Aegis and Deadly Unity aura range to 9".

enhancements.name: Gift of Terran Artifice
enhancements.description: +1 to Wound rolls in melee.

enhancements.name: Radiant Mantle
enhancements.description: Attacks targeting bearer from within 12" suffer -1 to Hit.

rules.name: Creeping Dread
rules.description: Aura: Enemy Psyker and below-strength units within 12" of Anathema Psykana must take Battle-shock tests in opponent's Command phase. Below half-strength units subtract 1 from the test.

stratagems.name: Desperation's Price
stratagems.description: After enemy Psyker uses ability: Leadership test - pass = Battle-shocked, fail = D3 mortal wounds and Battle-shocked.

stratagems.name: Witch Hunters
stratagems.description: Anathema unit gains Lethal Hits or Sustained Hits 1 (targets Psykers only).

stratagems.name: Anathema Blademastery
stratagems.description: Vigilators re-roll Hit rolls; re-roll Wounds vs Battle-shocked or Psyker.

stratagems.name: Psy-Chaff Volley
stratagems.description: Prosecutors' targets become 'prosecuted': enemy Psyker/Battle-shocked subtract 1 to Hit; Anathema gain +1 AP vs them.

stratagems.name: Purgation Sweep
stratagems.description: Witchseekers gain +1 Attack with Torrent weapons; +2 vs Psyker/Battle-shocked.

stratagems.name: Psychic Abominations
stratagems.description: Anathema Infantry gains Stealth; Battle-shocked/Psykers can only target within 12".

enhancements.name: Enhanced Voidsheen Cloak
enhancements.description: Anathema model only. Subtract 1 from Damage; reduce to 1 if from Psyker or Battle-shocked.

enhancements.name: Huntress' Eye
enhancements.description: Anathema model only. In Command phase, select enemy within 12" to take Battle-shock test.

enhancements.name: Oblivion Knight
enhancements.description: Anathema model only. Led unit gains +1 to Hit; +1 to Wound vs Psyker units.

enhancements.name: Raptor Blade
enhancements.description: Anathema model only. +1 Attack, +1 Strength, +1 Damage; +2 each vs Battle-shocked Psykers.

rules.name: Assemblage of Might
rules.description: In your Command phase, select one enemy unit. Character units gain +1 to Wound rolls targeting it until your next Command phase.

stratagems.name: Slayer of Champions
stratagems.description: When Character destroys Assemblage target: select new target gaining +1 to Wound; gain 1CP if target was Character.

stratagems.name: Superhuman Reserves
stratagems.description: Warlord can use a 'once per battle' ability an additional time. Maximum once per battle.

stratagems.name: Emperor's Auspice
stratagems.description: Character unit gains Feel No Pain 4+ until end of phase.

stratagems.name: Earning of a Name
stratagems.description: Two Character units re-roll Hits and Wounds vs Monsters/Vehicles.

stratagems.name: Vigil Unending
stratagems.description: Destroyed Character fights before removal from play.

stratagems.name: Shoulder the Mantle
stratagems.description: Character not leading a unit attaches to nearby eligible unit.

enhancements.name: Blade Imperator
enhancements.description: On charge: D3 mortal wounds on 4+. Once per battle, nearby enemies take Battle-shock.

enhancements.name: Inspirational Exemplar
enhancements.description: Leadership 5+. Once per battle, remove Battle-shocked from friendly unit within 12".

enhancements.name: Martial Philosopher
enhancements.description: Unit eligible to shoot/charge after falling back. Once per battle, 6" move when enemy ends within 9".

enhancements.name: Veiled Blade
enhancements.description: +2 Attacks to melee weapons. Once per battle, triple Objective Control in Command phase.

rules.name: Auric Armour
rules.description: At Starting Strength: +2 OC (non-Aircraft, non-Battle-shocked). Below Starting Strength: re-roll Hit rolls of 1. Below Half-strength: re-roll Hit and Wound rolls of 1.

rules.name: Moritoi Ancients
rules.description: Walkers gain +2" Move and +1 to Advance/Charge rolls. Up to 2 Walker models can gain Character keyword.

stratagems.name: Unstoppable Advance
stratagems.description: Vehicle moves additional 6" after moving.

stratagems.name: Crushing Momentum
stratagems.description: Charging Vehicle re-rolls Charge roll and Hit rolls.

stratagems.name: Machine Spirit's Wrath
stratagems.description: Vehicle not selected to shoot makes attacks with full Ballistic Skill.

stratagems.name: Venerable Guardian
stratagems.description: Vehicle within range of objective gains +2 Toughness.

stratagems.name: Armored Breach
stratagems.description: Vehicle charges through terrain without penalty.

stratagems.name: Relic Onslaught
stratagems.description: Vehicle gains Lethal Hits or Sustained Hits 1.

enhancements.name: Adamantine Talisman
enhancements.description: Vehicle only. Gains Feel No Pain 4+.

enhancements.name: Armor of Eternal Fortune
enhancements.description: Vehicle only. -1 to Damage characteristic of attacks.

enhancements.name: Venerable Destroyer
enhancements.description: Vehicle only. +1 to Wound rolls; improve AP by 1.

enhancements.name: Warlord's Steed
enhancements.description: Vehicle only. +1 Objective Control at Starting Strength.

rules.name: Against All Odds
rules.description: Units below half-strength gain +1 Attack. Units below quarter-strength gain additional +1 Attack.

stratagems.name: Desperate Counter
stratagems.description: Below half-strength unit eligible to fight after falling back.

stratagems.name: Heroic Intervention
stratagems.description: Unit within 6" of charged unit can fight immediately.

stratagems.name: Refusal to Yield
stratagems.description: Below half-strength unit gains Feel No Pain 5+.

stratagems.name: Final Onslaught
stratagems.description: Dying model can make attacks before removal from play.

stratagems.name: Unyielding Stand
stratagems.description: Unit on objective: -1 to Wound rolls against it.

enhancements.name: Unstoppable Fury
enhancements.description: Melee weapons gain Lethal Hits.

enhancements.name: Unbreakable Will
enhancements.description: Model gains Feel No Pain 5+ and cannot be reduced below 1 wound per attack.

enhancements.name: Last Stand
enhancements.description: Once per battle, after casualties: auto-pass Battle-shock and heal 1 model.

enhancements.name: Valiant Heart
enhancements.description: Model's unit: -1 to Hit in melee against it.

coreStratagems.name: Command Re-roll
coreStratagems.when: In any phase, just after you have made a Hit roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll, a saving throw, an Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test, a Hazardous test, or just after you have rolled the dice to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon.
coreStratagems.target: An attack, model or unit from your army.
coreStratagems.effect: You re-roll that roll, test or saving throw.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: In any phase, just after you have made a Hit roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll, a saving throw, an Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test, a Hazardous test, or just after you have rolled the dice to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon. TARGET: An attack, model or unit from your army. EFFECT: You re-roll that roll, test or saving throw.

coreStratagems.name: Counter-offensive
coreStratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has fought.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has fought. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase. EFFECT: Your unit fights next.

coreStratagems.name: Epic Challenge
coreStratagems.when: Fight phase, when a CHARACTER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more Attached units is selected to fight.
coreStratagems.target: One CHARACTER model in your unit.
coreStratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the [PRECISION] ability.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Fight phase, when a CHARACTER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more Attached units is selected to fight. TARGET: One CHARACTER model in your unit. EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the [PRECISION] ability.

coreStratagems.name: Fire Overwatch
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your Shooting phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: An unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit. You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your Shooting phase. EFFECT: Your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase. RESTRICTIONS: An unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit. You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.

coreStratagems.name: Go to Ground
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
coreStratagems.target: One INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
coreStratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have a 6+ invulnerable save and have the Benefit of Cover.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets. TARGET: One INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks. EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have a 6+ invulnerable save and have the Benefit of Cover.

coreStratagems.name: Grenade
coreStratagems.target: One GRENADES unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of any units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your GRENADES unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your Shooting phase. TARGET: One GRENADES unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase. EFFECT: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of any units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your GRENADES unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

coreStratagems.name: Heroic Intervention
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: You can only select a VEHICLE unit if it is a WALKER. Your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase. EFFECT: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase. RESTRICTIONS: You can only select a VEHICLE unit if it is a WALKER. Your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

coreStratagems.name: Insane Bravery
coreStratagems.when: Battle-shock step of your Command phase, just after you have failed a Battle-shock test taken for a unit from your army.
coreStratagems.target: The unit from your army that Battle-shock test was just taken for (even though your Battle-shocked units cannot normally be affected by your Stratagems).
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit is treated as having passed that test instead, and is not Battle-shocked as a result.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Battle-shock step of your Command phase, just after you have failed a Battle-shock test taken for a unit from your army. TARGET: The unit from your army that Battle-shock test was just taken for (even though your Battle-shocked units cannot normally be affected by your Stratagems). EFFECT: Your unit is treated as having passed that test instead, and is not Battle-shocked as a result.

coreStratagems.name: Rapid Ingress
coreStratagems.when: End of your opponent's Movement phase.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is in Reserves.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: End of your opponent's Movement phase. TARGET: One unit from your army that is in Reserves. EFFECT: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase. RESTRICTIONS: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.

coreStratagems.name: Tank Shock
coreStratagems.target: One VEHICLE unit from your army.
coreStratagems.effect: After your unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then select one melee weapon your unit is equipped with. Roll a number of D6 equal to that weapon's Strength characteristic. If that Strength characteristic is greater than that enemy unit's Toughness characteristic, roll two additional D6. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your Charge phase. TARGET: One VEHICLE unit from your army. EFFECT: After your unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then select one melee weapon your unit is equipped with. Roll a number of D6 equal to that weapon's Strength characteristic. If that Strength characteristic is greater than that enemy unit's Toughness characteristic, roll two additional D6. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

martial_katah.name: Martial Ka'tah
martial_katah.description: At the start of the Fight phase, select a Ka'tah Stance to be active for your Custodes models.

imperial_agents.name: Imperial Agents
imperial_agents.description: Agents of the Imperium can be included in any IMPERIUM army.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: Can lead Inquisitorial Agents, Imperial Navy Breachers, Exaction Squad, Subductor Squad, Vigilant Squad, or any IMPERIUM BATTLELINE INFANTRY.

abilities.name: Authority of the Inquisition
abilities.description: While leading a unit, can embark in any TRANSPORT the Bodyguard unit can.

abilities.name: Xenos Hunter
abilities.description: While leading a unit, add +1 to Hit rolls against enemies without IMPERIUM or CHAOS keywords.

abilities.name: Psychic Veil
abilities.description: Command phase: Roll D6. On 1, suffer D3 mortal wounds. On 2+, can only be targeted by ranged attacks within 18" until next Command phase.

weapon.name: Anti-X #+
weapon.description: Improve AP by 1 and wound on #+ against targets with keyword X.

weapon.name: Assault
weapon.description: Can be shot after Advancing.

weapon.name: Blast
weapon.description: +1 Attack per 5 models in target unit.

weapon.name: Devastating Wounds
weapon.description: Critical wounds inflict mortal wounds equal to Damage, no saves allowed.

weapon.name: Extra Attacks
weapon.description: Attacks with this weapon are made in addition to other weapons.

weapon.name: Hazardous
weapon.description: After resolving attacks, roll D6. On 1, bearer suffers 3 mortal wounds (Characters) or is destroyed (other models).

weapon.name: Heavy
weapon.description: +1 to Hit if unit Remained Stationary.

weapon.name: Ignores Cover
weapon.description: Target does not benefit from cover.

weapon.name: Indirect Fire
weapon.description: Can target units not visible. -1 to Hit, +1 to target's Save if not visible.

weapon.name: Lance
weapon.description: +1 to Wound if unit charged this turn.

weapon.name: Lethal Hits
weapon.description: Critical hits automatically wound (no wound roll needed).

weapon.name: Melta X
weapon.description: +X Damage against targets within half range.

weapon.name: One Shot
weapon.description: Can only be used once per battle.

weapon.name: Pistol
weapon.description: Can be shot in Engagement Range, but only at units in Engagement Range.

weapon.name: Precision
weapon.description: On critical wounds, attacker can allocate wound to a Character or Attached model.

weapon.name: Psychic
weapon.description: Weapon has the Psychic keyword for ability interactions.

weapon.name: Rapid Fire X
weapon.description: +X Attacks when targeting units within half range.

weapon.name: Sustained Hits X
weapon.description: Critical hits score X additional hits.

weapon.name: Torrent
weapon.description: Automatically hits (no hit roll needed).

weapon.name: Twin-linked
weapon.description: Re-roll wound rolls.

unit.name: Battleline
unit.description: Core troop units. May have special rules in certain detachments.

unit.name: Character
unit.description: Can lead units, receive Enhancements, and is targeted by Precision.

unit.name: Deep Strike
unit.description: Can be set up in Reserves and arrive 9"+ from enemies in Reinforcements step.

unit.name: Epic Hero
unit.description: Unique named character. Limited to 1 per army.

unit.name: Feel No Pain X+
unit.description: Roll D6 when losing a wound. On X+, wound is ignored.

unit.name: Fights First
unit.description: In Fight phase, fights before units without this ability.

unit.name: Fly
unit.description: Can move over models/terrain. Can move within Engagement Range freely.

unit.name: Infiltrators
unit.description: Can deploy anywhere 9"+ from enemy deployment zone and enemies.

unit.name: Leader
unit.description: Can be attached to Bodyguard units. Abilities affect the combined unit.

unit.name: Lone Operative
unit.description: Cannot be targeted unless within 12" of attacking model.

unit.name: Scouts X"
unit.description: Make a Normal move of up to X" before first turn begins.

unit.name: Stealth
unit.description: Ranged attacks targeting this unit suffer -1 to Hit.
